androidx.test.runner.intercepting

Class SingleActivityFactory<T extends Activity>

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.test.runner.intercepting.SingleActivityFactory<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InterceptingActivityFactory

    public abstract class SingleActivityFactory<T extends Activity>
extends java.lang.Object
implements InterceptingActivityFactory
    Abstract implementation of InterceptingActivityFactory which allows to intercept only one activity at a time. Child classes are responsible for creating activity object.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SingleActivityFactory(java.lang.Class<T> activityClassToIntercept) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Activity create(java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader, java.lang.String className, Intent intent)
      This method can be used to provide activity instance while intercepting activity creation for a particular activity in response to a given intent.
      protected abstract T create(Intent intent)
      This method needs to be implemented by child class to create activity object for the given intent that specified the activity class being instantiated.
      java.lang.Class<T> getActivityClassToIntercept()
      This method can be used to get the Class of activity being instantiated by this factory.
      boolean shouldIntercept(java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader, java.lang.String className, Intent intent)
      This method can be used to know whether activity instance creation should be intercepted or not for a particular activity in response to a given intent.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • shouldIntercept

        public final boolean shouldIntercept(java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader,
                                     java.lang.String className,
                                     Intent intent)
        Description copied from interface: InterceptingActivityFactory
        This method can be used to know whether activity instance creation should be intercepted or not for a particular activity in response to a given intent.
        Specified by:
        shouldIntercept in interface InterceptingActivityFactory
        Parameters:
        classLoader - The ClassLoader with which to instantiate the object
        className - The name of the class implementing the Activity object
        intent - The Intent object that specified the activity class being instantiated.
        Returns:
        true if activity with className should be intercepted, otherwise false.

      • create

        public final Activity create(java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader,
                             java.lang.String className,
                             Intent intent)
        Description copied from interface: InterceptingActivityFactory
        This method can be used to provide activity instance while intercepting activity creation for a particular activity in response to a given intent.
        Specified by:
        create in interface InterceptingActivityFactory
        Parameters:
        classLoader - The ClassLoader with which to instantiate the object
        className - The name of the class implementing the Activity object
        intent - The Intent object that specified the activity class being instantiated.
        Returns:

      • getActivityClassToIntercept

        public final java.lang.Class<T> getActivityClassToIntercept()
        This method can be used to get the Class of activity being instantiated by this factory.
        Returns:
        Class of the activity object being instantiated

      • create

        protected abstract T create(Intent intent)
        This method needs to be implemented by child class to create activity object for the given intent that specified the activity class being instantiated.
        Parameters:
        intent - The Intent object that specified the activity class being instantiated.
        Returns:
        The newly instantiated Activity object.
